The claim states that bakers: florists, and photographers are being forced to participate in same-sex marriages under the threat of law and even jail.
The expert: s verdict also mentions the specific states, such as Washington and Colorado, where anti-discrimination statutes have been imposed and vendors have been sued by the government for refusing to participate in same-sex weddings.
The investigation mentioned in the exper: s verdict aims to determine if there have been cases where bakers or florists have been arrested or faced legal consequences for refusing to serve gay couples, suggesting that verifying the existence of such incidents is one aspect employed to verify the claim.
